job.title: Senior Software Engineer - C++, Python
job.description: If you are a Senior Software Engineer with experience please read onbrbrWere looking for a experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our team We are looking for someone who has built and managed software teams for delivering commercial quality software We have built the worlds first truly scalable DNAbased platform for massive digital data storage and now we are working with pilot customers and partners to bring our technologies to marketbrbrTop Reasons to Work with UsbrbrDeveloper of data conversions to offer the next generation of digital data and computation Brining cuttingedge biological technologies to the world of information storage and computationbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrAs a Senior Software Engineer youll tasked with leading a team that will help create the operational infrastructure to support the teams around you using C Python and API design Also looking to create a hybrid cloud architecture to scale for commercial engagements You will participate in planning and execution of the companies technology This position gives the opportunity to help with groundbreaking research that with your work can help change the world around usbrbrWhat You Need for this PositionbrbrstronguMust Have SkillsbrustrongulliMS in Computer Science or related fieldliliBuilt and Managed software teamsliliExperience in Devops Data ops frontback end
